Title: Varathan
Actors: Fahadh Faasil, Aishwarya Lekshmi, Sharafudheen, Dileesh Pothan
Plot: After losing his job Abin along with his wife Priya, who has suffered a miscarriage, decide to shift from Dubai to Priya's family estate in Kerala. However, peace eludes the couple as they run into a set of new troubles.
